content: Consider finding your local Big Lots. They carry Bob’s Red Mill brand and the steel cut oats would be much less costly there. They also often get herbs and other pantry staples that are discounted over a grocery store price. Not everything is a great price, but if you know your costs normally, you can see which ones are cheaper. Baked snack foods, canned beans, condiments, imported foods and even high quality dog treats from Blue Dog Bakery and others. It will cut that grocery bill.
